thread.title: Hull City charged by the FA following controversial Arsenal match
thread.title_full: Hull City charged by the FA following controversial Arsenal match

author: admin
title: Hull City charged by the FA following controversial Arsenal match
text:
Hull City charged by the FA following controversial Arsenal match 14 Feb Read more about sharing. Hull players surround referee Mark Clattenburg as he shows a yellow card to Gibbs Hull have been charged for failing to control their players during the 2-0 Premier League defeat at Arsenal. 
The Football Association charge relates to an incident "in or around" the 55th minute of the game, when Arsenal full-back Kieran Gibbs was booked for a foul on Hull winger Lazar Markovic. 
The FA said Hull allegedly failed to ensure their players conducted themselves in an orderly fashion. 
Hull have until 18:00 GMT on Friday, 17 February to respond. Share this page
